hero.heading: FullStack Developer
hero.shortDescription: Building fast, modern web experiences with React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Currently shipping products across the US, Dominican Republic, and Cuba.

projects.title: Countinkly
projects.description: NextJS app with Shadcn, TailwindCSS, Recharts, Lucia Auth, Prisma ORM, and PostgreSQL. Register and track link visits including social network and country data. Explore and interact with others' links through likes, comments, and shares.

projects.title: Samu LLanes Website
projects.description: Custom website built as a freelance job for a skilled photographer based in Havana, Cuba. Built with Astro and React for interactions, optimized for SEO best practices, with Framer Motion animations for a modern touch.

projects.title: Lambda Solar Website
projects.description: Official website revamped using Astro, TailwindCSS, and DaisyUI, with i18n for internationalization. Modernized to reflect Lambda Solar Energies' cutting-edge image and latest technologies.

projects.title: Movie Paradise
projects.description: NextJS app with NextUI and TailwindCSS, powered by Supabase. Access TMDB API for comprehensive movie and TV show details. Register to comment, mark favorites, and create watchlists.

projects.title: Mixóloga E-Menu
projects.description: Minimal vintage digital menu for La Mixóloga bar in Vedado, Havana. Integrated with Contentful CMS for easy updates and internationalization via Astro.

projects.title: calCUPlator
projects.description: Real-time USD and MLC exchange rates for Cuba. Built with NextJS, TailwindCSS, ShadCn, and Zustand for state management.

projects.title: AnimeCu
projects.description: Modern anime and manga discovery platform built with NextJS and TypeScript, using the JikanMoe API with advanced search filters and trailer playback.

projects.title: Cuban Bazar
projects.description: NextJS e-commerce built for a Mercado Libre technical test. Uses NextUI, route handlers for a mock API, and Zustand for a persistent shopping cart.

projects.title: Electric Bill Calculator
projects.description: React + TailwindCSS app for calculating electricity consumption in Cuba. Uses React Hook Form for proper user input handling.

projects.title: Euforia Habana
projects.description: Custom digital menu for Euforia, a restaurant in Havana, Cuba. Built with Astro and TailwindCSS — fast, mobile-first, and easy to navigate without any app download.

aboutMe.heading: About Me
aboutMe.description:
My name is Carlos Yoan and I'm a FullStack Developer from Cuba. I graduated as an Electrical Engineer from Marta Abreu Central University of Las Villas — but my real passion turned out to be building for the web.

Over the past two years I've worked with teams in the US, Dominican Republic, and Cuba, shipping real products: SaaS dashboards, AI-powered apps, admin tools, and more. I specialize in React and Next.js with deep knowledge of TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and modern frontend architecture.

Outside of client work, I build my own projects like KilahUI and Katarogu, always pushing to learn new things and improve as a developer.
